feed.title: Against Allowing Quantum Recovery of Bitcoin

entry.title: Against Allowing Quantum Recovery of Bitcoin
entry.summary:
Given the constraints and requirements, it seems there is an omission of specific content from a programmer's email to be summarized. For a detailed and structured summary with the provided guidelines, I would need the actual content of the email or messages that discuss programming knowledge, issues, developments, or any other relevant information.
Without the specific details from the emails or messages on the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List," it is challenging to create a summary. If you provide the main points or topics covered in the email(s) received by Javier Mateos, particularly those related to Bitcoin development as mentioned, I can then craft a summary following the outlined rules. This would include restructuring the information into a cohesive narrative while avoiding direct references to the context, ensuring formal tone, grammatical correctness, proper formatting of any links provided, and excluding farewell parts.
